QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Dragonblight!
QuestData.Description: The Warchief wishes to reinforce the Horde's presence at Agmar's Hammer in the Dragonblight.$b$bThe fortress is a vital staging point for our assault on Icecrown and pivotal to containing the chaotic magic energies being released throughout the land.$b$bReport to Archmage Aethas Sunreaver.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Image of Archmage Aethas Sunreaver at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: What took you so long? Time waits only for Aspects, $r.$B$BWe have much work to do, you and I.
